name: Tunnel Hawk
description:
Tunnel Hawk is a simple game in which our Hawk is falling down a drilled out tunnel, dodging drill bits and steel girders leftover from the drill.

No one really knows how long the tunnel is, why it was drilled out in the first place, or why T.H. is flying down it! So what compels him to continue to travel down this treacherous tunnel? Who knows! But we must try to guide him through it as long as we possibly can.

See how far down you can travel, and how many distracting diamonds you can collect on the way. Thanks for playing!
